name: LIGHTBRINGER (Hugo Damiao)
description:
Lighbringer, responsible for keeping the balance and sending the Light of Life to the light World, was taking a break from her work and wandering around the Palace of Light when she heard a huge bang coming from the control room, immediately felt her powers begin to weaken, her energy was being drained and she was being taken by the darkness, it could only mean that Void, her archenemy, had invaded the palace to bring unbalance to the world, she had to get to the control room, but she need Catch Focus of light to keep your energy strong enough to face it.

A Game by:

Felipe Lopes

Hugo Damiao

Wellington Nascimento

Leone Damiao
